example.code: PS C:\> $Credit = New-Object -TypeName Amazon.EC2.Model.InstanceCreditSpecificationRequest PS C:\> $Credit.InstanceId = "i-01234567890abcdef" PS C:\> $Credit.CpuCredits = "unlimited" PS C:\> Edit-EC2InstanceCreditSpecification -InstanceCreditSpecification $Credit
example.description: This enables T2 unlimited credits for instance i-01234567890abcdef.
